metadata.Title: CVE-2016-10071 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
coders/mat.c in ImageMagick before 6.9.4-0 allows remote attackers to causea denial of service (out-of-bounds read and application crash) via acrafted mat file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-10071` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

imagemagick - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.3
imagemagick-common - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.3
libmagick++5 - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.3
libmagickcore5 - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.3
libmagickcore5-extra - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.3
libmagickwand5 - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.3
perlmagick - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: imagemagick package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.3').
